channel.title: Promote command delta

item.title: Promote command delta
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

yes ik what try and catch do
i just figured it out

if (command.startsWith("promote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(3); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; playerRights++; savegame(true); disconnected = true; } catch (Exception e) { sM("Fail."); } }
thats my new command this works fine

Read full topic

promote someone to mod if he is a player or promote someone to admin if hes a mod or promote someone to owner if hes admin or promote someone to hidden owner if hes owner…

item.title: Promote command delta
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

need help with a command

if (command.startsWith("promote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(3); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; playerRights = 1; savegame(true); disconnected = true; } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+"either isnt onlne or doesnt exist."); } catch(Exception e) { playerRights = 2; savegame(true); disconnected = true; } catch(Exception e) { playerRights = 3; savegame(true); disconnected = true; } catch(Exception e) { playerRights = 4; savegame(true); disconnected = true; } }

i get 3 catch exception errors

Read full topic
